page.title: 04HULL FAIR, 2.
page.content: Hull Fair is held every year at Walton Street. It starts on a Saturday morning at eleven o'clock and finishes at midnight on the following Saturday. Sometimes on a Wednesday night some of the rides and stalls are a bit cheaper. There are lots of stalls and rides, and lots of food to eat (e.g. fish and chips). Every year there are dodgems and "Hook a Duck" stalls. On the Dodgems you try to steer a car without hitting any other cars. On the "Hook a Duck" stalls you get a rod and you have to hook a plastic duck. If you succeed in the challenge you win a prize (e.g. a yoyo, a keyring or a pack of playing cards) but if you do not hook a duck you may receive a booby prize (e.g. a massive Â£10.00 note).
